text:
“There is no new tone. ... This is a President who, even with almost 150,000 Americans dead, can’t even stay on script to save American lives.”

@donlemon discusses the WH coronavirus briefing and a video Trump retweeted featuring a group of doctors making false Covid-19 claims. https://t.co/OhPEHCJ4Hx

entity.name: US breaks record with over 77,000 cases of COVID-19 in one day
entity.description: The death toll rose by 974, taking the country’s total to 138,201.
